items.summary: Fix the backend pond creation flow so that the pond creator is automatically added to the new pond’s `members : [Text]` (phrase-hash userId list) at creation time, and ensure `memberCount` accurately reflects actual membership (i.e., do not preset/increment `memberCount` without persisting the creator in `members`).

When a pond is created, update (or create if missing) the creator’s phrase-hash `UserProfile` so `joinedPonds` contains the newly created pond name immediately after creation (no separate join action required).
